aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.name: Valeri Levinson
paragraphs: **Hi, I'm Valeri**. I'm a Full-Stack Developer with a strong focus on **backend systems, SaaS architecture**, and **networking-integrated applications**. I specialize in **Python, FastAPI, Django, Next.js**, and modern technologies like **Docker** and **AWS**. Based in Bat-Yam, Israel, I bring hands-on experience in both **full-stack development** and **enterprise networking**.

I'm passionate about building **scalable, intuitive** web platformsâ€”particularly in the **CRM** and **ticketing** space. I thrive on creating **impactful** backend systems, crafting **thoughtful** interfaces, and solving **real-world challenges** through clean, purpose-driven code.

In my free time, I enhance my skills by learning new technologies, and developing production-ready tools like my live **Ticket Manager** app. I'm currently working on expanding it with **premium SaaS features**, and preparing to open-source a full **CRM platform** later this year.

items.title: Full Stack Development
items.text: I am proficient in building and deploying production-ready applications end-to-end. On the frontend, I utilize Figma for UI/UX design and Next.js (React) combined with Material UI and Bootstrap to deliver visually appealing and responsive interfaces. On the backend, I leverage FastAPI and Django as robust and scalable frameworks, complemented by strong knowledge of both SQL and NoSQL databases. For deployment and automation, I use GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines, Docker for containerization, and AWS for reliable cloud infrastructure.

items.title: backend development
items.text: I build high-performing backends focused on efficiency, security, and maintainability. My expertise includes designing optimized database schemas, creating scalable RESTful APIs, implementing efficient routing and middleware, and writing comprehensive unit tests to ensure reliability. With deep proficiency in Python frameworks such as Django and FastAPI, as well as databases (both SQL and NoSQL), I tailor backend solutions precisely to each project's requirements.

items.title: Networking & Security
items.text: I have deep expertise in networking and security, essential for building robust web applications. My experience includes designing, implementing, and troubleshooting network infrastructures to ensure seamless communication and optimal performance. I specialize in firewall configuration and management (Cisco, Fortinet, Check Point, Juniper), DNS management, and secure, scalable network solutions. Leveraging AWS, I deploy and manage cloud-based services, ensuring reliability, scalability, and cost efficiency for modern applications.

list.title: Ticket Manager
list.text: Fullstack web application designed to help organizations efficiently manage their operational tasks through an intuitive ticketing system.

list.title: Valar CRM
list.text: A free Customer Relationship Management (CRM) portal tailored for small businesses. Designed for simplicity, security, and speed, it features an intuitive user interface and visually appealing graphical insights.

list.title: Weather API Comparison
list.text: A Weather API Comparison application that highlights discrepancies between two forecasting APIs, demonstrating how online data can sometimes be inaccurate.

list.title: Top Down Fighter
list.text: A top-down fighter game featuring smooth FPS handling, intense battles against monsters and bosses, brought to life with beautifully crafted pixel art assets.
